Question: Instead of turning slightly to the left to navigate around the building, if you choose to ascend over the building, can you still reach the shop with the sign name '荆楚食光'?  
Choices: A. I can complete the task, but the alternative route takes longer.  
          B. I cannot complete the task because I will be too high to see the shop.  
          C. I can complete the task because I avoid obstacles and take a shorter route.

Question: Instead of turning to the right, if you choose to fly forward towards the twin high-rise buildings, can you complete the task, and how is the alternative route?  
Choices:  
A. I might be able to complete the task but take longer.  
B. I can complete the task because I maintain visibility before descending.  
C. I cannot complete the task because the final destination is in the opposite direction.

Question: Instead of aligning yourself directly in front of the windows on the highest floor, if you decide to hover above the rooftop gardens, can you still reach the purple window sill on the highest floor?
